body.name: Bed Sheet Organizer Bands, Sheet Set Storage Label Bands, Elastic Bedding Sheet Straps Wraps for Organizing Linen Closet（King 4PCs | Gold）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Siaomo' Custom Design: (4 sizes available Twin/ Full/ Queen/ King) Our bed sheet organizer band knitted with forty high elasticity latex threads and premium polyamide fiber, durable and long-lasting, Clearly woven lettering with elegant morandi color.
Convenient Identification: Siaomo sheet organizer for linen closet help you to easily identify your bedsheets, pillowcases, protectors, duvets and bedding sets.
Space Saving, Clean and Tidy: Using our linen labels bedding elastic bands can save a lot of closet space and keep the closet neat and beautiful.
Simple and Convenient to Use: Simply wrap around these stretchy sheet straps easily on your folded bedding. Package Include 4 pieces of bed sheet organizer with same size.
Wide Range of Use: practical and sufficient, you can use our bed sheet organizer for a variety of things and usage scenarios, For home, airbnb, dorm, hotel and other storage and organization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unneccesaey accessory but I love it
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those items that is not worth the price, but then again it is bc it makes you feel good. A girl’s headband would do the same trick but I still am glad I got these. Only downside is no adjustment to the bands, so for example I have a thicker set of winter sheets that this barely fits around -and a really thin set of bamboo viscose sheets that this is too big for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars why didn't I think of that?
reviews.reviewText: Finally a way to organize my linen closet! Such a simple concept. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big Convience for a Small Price
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know how useful these bedding bands are until I ordered some. My linen closet was a mess with towels and bedding never staying together for very long, requiring complete dismantling and reorganizing nearly ever time I change the linens to find items that match. That ended immediately when I started deploying these bands. I now have a full set of linens ready to go for each bed in the house neatly stored at all times, and the closet itself looks neat and and tidy. I also use these bands to keep my towel sets together, folded and easy to get to. It's no longer a chore requiring pulling out multiple items and sometimes the whole closet when I need something. Small things really do matter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My linen closet is organized
reviews.reviewText: So many sheet sets for various size beds. Felt like I was always trying to guess what size I was taking out. I had started putting a piece of paper pinned to the set for the size. These bands are great. Fit well. Hold set together. One look on the closet and I know what set fits which bed. Happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: An excellent option for organize your closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Would love these so much more if they were adjustable
reviews.reviewText: I like these little bands in general, they are those "very simple but very useful" kinds of things. The bands themselves seem pretty well made/sturdy, the color and writing on them is pretty, and overall they do make things look a lot more organized and fancy ish. My biggest problem with them is also my only problem with them - they are fixed in one size and it takes quite a bit to fill that one size. I folded and wrapped up 3 sets of sheets (all Queen size) and only one of the sets fit well in the band, which had a fitted sheet, larger top sheet, and 4 pillow cases. If all of your sets are like that, then the size of these will probably work well for you. But if you have anything less (like sets with only 2 pillow cases) or a fabric that is a little denser when folded (like satin type sheets) then you're probably going to run into the same problem I did - and either have your stuff barely held together at all OR having to find other pillow cases/etc to shove in there to get more of a tight fit. I went with the latter option and even then (with one set) there was still way too much room for the strap to work very effectively. I wound up just putting a second band on that set to give it a better chance of being held together.If they had like a few sets of eye hooks, like on a bra, so that you could loosen or tighten a bit, I would like these a lot lot more. But overall they are cute/helpful and for the price for them is very fair.Shipping and delivery was done in a timely manner, received them 2 days after ordering them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for keeping bundles of linens separated and organized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these thinking it would have Velcro or be able to open and close in some way. But they don't. They are sewn as one piece. Very hard to get on folded items. I returned.
